name: Star Striker
overview: Star Striker is a fast-paced doujin shooter for the PC-9801 by Promiscence (the same company of atomic punker). There's no power ups, your ship fires a broad forward shot and homing missiles when there's something to target. You don't have a conventional number of lives, either, with a score deduction for dying followed by immediate re-spawn. There are no bombs in this game, with the second button you can accelerate your ship.
